function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal variances between buildings due to method type","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of building performance and risk levels","Mitigation":"Use statistical methods to adjust for unequal variances, consider alternative assessment methods","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, simulation and modeling software","People":"Researchers, building owners, risk assessors","Owner":"Researchers, building owners, risk assessors"},{"Description":"Differential effectiveness of methods based on building type","Impact":"Unequal protection against contagious diseases in different types of buildings","Mitigation":"Adapt methods to specific building types, prioritize effective methods for high-risk buildings","Technologies":"Building design and construction technologies, operational and maintenance technologies","People":"Building designers, maintenance professionals, building owners","Owner":"Building designers, maintenance professionals, building owners"},{"Description":"Inefficiency of type 3 methods in low and medium-risk buildings","Impact":"Inadequate risk mitigation in low and medium-risk buildings","Mitigation":"Enhance the effectiveness of type 3 methods for all building types, consider alternative approaches for low and medium-risk buildings","Technologies":"Innovative building design and construction technologies, operational and maintenance technologies","People":"Building designers, maintenance professionals, building owners","Owner":"Building designers, maintenance professionals, building owners"}]}
